import React, { useState } from 'react' import { FormattedMessage } from 'react-intl' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { UserOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons' import { Menu, Dropdown, Avatar, Badge } from 'antd' import { history } from 'index' import styles from './style.module.scss' const mapStateToProps = ({ user }) => ({ user }) const ProfileMenu = ({ dispatch, user }) => { const [count, setCount] = useState(7) const logout = e => { e.preventDefault() dispatch({ type: 'user/LOGOUT', }) history.push('/auth/login') } const addCount = () => { setCount(count + 1) } const menu = ( , {user.name || 'Anonymous'}
:{' '} Professional
:{' '} {user.role}
:{' '} {user.email}
:{' '} {user.phone || '— '}
e.preventDefault()}> ) return (
} />
) } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(ProfileMenu)
